# Generated by amkparse.py
# Modify if needed then remove this comment.
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.22)

project(lua-camera LANGUAGES C CXX)

#
# camera
#
add_library(camera SHARED
	src/lua/main.cpp
	src/android/Android.cpp
)
set_target_properties(camera PROPERTIES
	OUTPUT_NAME camera
	PREFIX ""
	CXX_STANDARD 11
)
target_include_directories(camera PRIVATE
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/android
)
target_link_libraries(camera PRIVATE
	luajit android log love
)
